Type: Medium swarm of Tiny constructs, unaligned
DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Swarm Adaptation
Traits.Content: The Erratum Swarm is adept at maneuvering through tight spaces, imposing disadvantage on attack rolls made against it when it is in a space that is difficult terrain.

Traits.Name: Reality Rewrite
Traits.Content: The Erratum Swarm can produce a confusing haze that disrupts concentration. Creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the swarm must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll or ability check they make before the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Erratum Swarm makes two attacks: one with its Confounding Strike and one with its Invasive Rewrite.

Actions.Name: Confounding Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 8 (1d8 + 4) damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll as it struggles to comprehend reality.

Actions.Name: Invasive Rewrite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 9 (2d4 + 4) damage. On a hit, the Erratum Swarm engulfs the target in a haze of errant letters and symbols, imposing disadvantage on any ability check the target makes before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Corrections Torrent
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Deals 11 (2d6 + 4) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be pulled 10 feet towards the swarm, as the swirl of correction marks disorients it.
